isis.stitle: DUAL DRAW DUAL RETURN FUEL TANKS - INSTALL

step1.para: Install the fuel tank level sending unit in the tank if required.
4000 Series: Install the supply tube in the fuel tank.
Install the hose fittings and optional shut-off valve if used.
Mount the fuel tank on the support brackets. Tighten the strap lock nuts to 30 to 35 ft-lbs. (41 to 47 Nm).
Reconnect the supply, return and over-flow hoses to the fuel tank ( Figure 6 and Figure 7).

figure.caption: Figure 6. 4000 Series Supply, Return and Over-Flow Hoses
Figure 7. 8100/9200/9300/9400 Series Supply, Return and Over-Flow Hoses

note.para: If the supply or return hose is replaced, it must be the same length as the supply or return hose used on the second tank.

step1.para: Re-connect the wires to the fuel tank level sending unit if so equipped.
Prime the fuel system. Refer to Group 12- Engines in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the priming method to use.
